articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Italian fugitive caught in Corfu thanks to photo celebrating football win
articles.description: Vincenzo La Porta has been on the run for 11 years but was tracked down to Corfu by police.
articles.content:
One of Italy's most dangerous fugitives has been caught in Corfu after a photo of him cheering on his football team gave away his whereabouts.
Vincenzo La Porta, 60, is thought to have close ties to… [+1779 chars]
